name: Light Hero
description:
Once upon a time the Darkness Master attacked a very nice village and put the people in jails. Our brave Light Hero comes to rescue them by his light . You have to find and take keys to open jails and free the villagers..

When you finish the first level you go to sweets level. When you finish the sweets level the villagers will be safe and thank you and you will win.

Use arrows to move left and right.

Space to shoot the red monster, who works for the Darkness Master.

NOTE: If the key is not shining then you missed one..go get it.
